_meanings:
{@--4@} (In Logic)
Proximity, the absence of 
interruption in the apprehension of what is
said, relation between two or more
proximate terms and the sense 
conveyed by them; {#kAraRaM sanniDAnaM tu#} 
{#padasyAsattirucyate#} <ls>Bhāṣā P. 83</ls>; {#vAkyaM syAd#}
{#yogyatAkAMkzAsattiyuktaH padoccayaH#} <ls>S. D. 2.</ls>
